Title: Dogman
Writer: Ugo Chiti (story), Matteo Garrone (story), Massimo Gaudioso (story), Ugo Chiti (screenplay), Matteo Garrone (screenplay), Massimo Gaudioso (screenplay), Marco Perfetti (collaborating writer), Damiano D'Innocenzo (collaborating writer), Fabio D'Innocenzo (collaborating writer), Giulio Troli (collaborating writer)
Actors: Marcello Fonte, Edoardo Pesce, Nunzia Schiano, Adamo Dionisi
Plot: Marcello, a small and gentle dog groomer, finds himself involved in a dangerous relationship of subjugation with Simone, a former violent boxer who terrorizes the entire neighborhood. In an...
